title: Oh You Handsome Now?!?
itunes:title: Oh You Handsome Now?!?
description:
TUE 6/21 - Charlamagne looks to Envy & Angela Yee for advice on how to respond to another man calling him "handsome". How should you react to same-sex compliments? Charlamagne doesn't have a problem reacting to pedophiles on a plane. He'll explain during Donkey of the Day.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
